body: Sailors know how to sail a ship, navigate while at sea, and defend the vessel against pirates and other hostile boarders. A typical sailor is a 2nd-level expert (NPC Codex 260) with 2 ranks each in Acrobatics, Climb, Perception, Profession (sailor), Survival, and Swim.
name: Sailors
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Teams/Sailors
